price: 43. (Se les dirá:)«Comed y bebed alegremente en recompensa por vuestras obras».
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
